title: Every pollen grain has a story
description: Pollen goes unnoticed by most of us, except when hay fever strikes. But microscopes reveal it comes in stunning colors and shapes -- and travels remarkably well. Jonathan Drori gives an up-close glimpse of these fascinating flecks of plant courtship.
author: Jonathan Drori
keywords: TED, talks, bees, biology, botany, environment, life, sex
